## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Notes

* A special ability that grants two modal abilities: [Duality of Mortal Presence - Body](/dualityOfMortalPresenceBody/) and [Duality of Mortal Presence - Mind](/dualityOfMortalPresenceMind/), granting a bonus to either [Constitution](/constitution/) or [Intellect](/intellect/) respectively.
* This ability is for display only. It doesn't show up in the character sheet, and is only shown in the ability tree. Although it isn't modal or active, it appears in the active abilities section of the tree.
